Class MainWindow

                    +--java.awt.Frame
                          |
                          +--uwcse.graphics.GWindow
                                |
                                +--uwcse.graphics.MainWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class MainWindow
extends GWindow

The MainWindow class is a special version of (i.e., a subclass of) the GWindow class that acts like the "default" window for any shapes created. If a MainWindow is created, and a shape is created without specifying a GWindow argument to the constructor, then the shape will be automatically added to the MainWindow.

Version:
$Id: MainWindow.java,v 1.4 2001/10/06 02:10:21 chambers Exp $
See Also:
